snippet.title: Line War - Cinematic Trailer (4K)
snippet.description:
Line War Release 36 has a new free camera mode for replays. This is a 1 minute cinematic video that was recorded using the new free flight camera mode from a replay. It features slowmotion, cinematic 4K replay footage.

Steam is a new type of multiplayer RTS games where you draw visual commands that your units follow. Play 2-8 players in 1v1, teams, and FFA modes.

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1309610/Line_War/ 

Website:
https://linewar.com/

Leaderboard:
https://linewar.com/Leaderboard

Discord (people chat and meet up here for games every day):
https://discord.com/invite/ZReTqqk4FV
